# LoggerConfigurationExtensions class

Convenience extensions for hooking Serilog loggers into [`LoggerManager`](./LoggerManager.md).

```csharp
public static class LoggerConfigurationExtensions
```

## Public Members

| name | description |
| --- | --- |
| static [Register](LoggerConfigurationExtensions/Register.md)(…) | Create a logger from this configuration and register it by name. |
